document_data.caption: ''Nature's Snare''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nature's Snare''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[staff]] found in the [[druidic]] enclave of the [[Western Heartlands]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Nature's Snare'' was a [[wood]]en staff of wriggling thread-like vines wrapped around its shaft.
document_data.Powers: The wielder could unleash its ''fly trap'' enchantment upon a successful strike, ''[[Ensnaring strike|ensnaring]]'' the target in place. However plant creatures and beasts were unaffected by this weapon's magic.
document_data.History: This staff was stashed within a trapped chest in a hidden cavern passage outside of the [[Emerald Grove]] in the Western Heartlands ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
